about_the_game:
You play as a young boy living together with his mother in his parent's house. The calm and familiar life of the protagonist changes at the moment when his older sister returns home after a long absence. From the very first meeting between them, a special bond emerges - the joy of the return of a loved one quickly grows into much deeper and contradictory feelings. The protagonist begins to feel an attraction to his sister, which confuses his thoughts and emotions. As the events unfold, the atmosphere in the house becomes more tense and intimate, and their relationship becomes more complex and ambiguous. The player will have to go through a series of challenging situations, exploring both the character's desires and his inner conflicts.

Key features:

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Incest Tales: Sister And Mom is a visual novel for adult audience. You take on the role of a young boy who lives in his parents' house with his mother. Their life flows in a measured manner until one day his older sister comes home.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
